backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, blob storage mixins, and CRUD for user profiles, artist profiles, lyrics, voice notes, song snippets, and conversations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, and feature pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry enabling PWA features with manifest, meta tags, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and required icon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Primary React app setup configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and profile setup flow.
Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wrapper component restricting access to authenticated users and showing a sign‑in prompt otherwise.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Mobile layout wrapper with header, content area, and bottom navigation that highlights active routes.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileF: Editable artist profile form supporting name, bio, genres, and social links with add/remove genre logic.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for initial artist profile creation with display name and optional bio submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for loading and mutating user profiles, artist profiles, lyrics, and related data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark themes and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/rhyme/rhymeEngine.ts: Generates rhyme suggestions for a word by matching common word endings.
frontend/src/lib/rhyme/wordlist.en.ts: Exports a large array of common English rhyming words used for rhyme generation.
frontend/src/lib/templates/songTemplates: Defines several song structure templates with names, descriptions, and formatted section layouts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays an artist’s profile with bio, genres, social links, and their song snippets, with navigation and messaging options.
frontend/src/pages/ConversationPage.tsx: Shows a messaging interface for a conversation, loads messages, sends new ones, and tracks recent conversations.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoveryPage.tsx: Provides a search bar and placeholder UI for future artist discovery functionality.
frontend/src/pages/HelpInstallPage.tsx: Offers step‑by‑step installation instructions for iOS and Android along with visual aids.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Displays recent conversations from local storage and links to message threads or a no‑messages state.
frontend/src/pages/LyricEditorPage.tsx: Provides a lyric editor with create, update, delete, tagging, template insertion, and rhyme suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/LyricsLibraryPage.tsx: Displays a searchable list of user lyrics with tags and updated dates, and enables creating new lyrics.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Manages artist profile editing and uploading audio song snippets with metadata and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceNotesPage.tsx: Allows recording, previewing, and saving short voice notes as audio blobs tied to user accounts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, writing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom theme extensions, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app vision, architecture notes, required images, and a list of existing feature definitions with versions.
